thread.section_title: Apex Temple Court Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: London weekend
thread.title_full: London weekend - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Steve L
title: London weekend
text: The Apex Hotel Temple Court is comfortable and friendly. The staff are very helpful and knowledgable. The location of the hotel is excellent for central London, St Pauls, the river, the Tate modern, the Globe theatre etc. A number of tube stations are close enough for an easy walk. The rooms are very good if a little on the pricy side although for London not too bad. This is our second visit to this hotel and we certainly will stay again.
